title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.198 - Materiality
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.198 - Materiality

State Regulations

The relative importance, when measured against a standard
of comparison, of all items (cumulative by cost center or account) included in
or omitted from books of account or financial statements, or any procedure or
change in procedure that conceivably might affect such statements. An amount is
material if its exclusion from or inclusion in an accounting statement would
make it misleading. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.198

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
